pages.title: ‎Apple Store App - App Store
pages.description: Download Apple Store by Apple on the App Store. See screenshots, ratings and reviews, user tips, and more games like Apple Store.

# Shopping designed around you
Free

 - Ages  4+   Years
 - Category           Shopping
 - Developer           Apple
 - Language  EN   + 23 More
 - Size  133   MB

# Ratings & Reviews
 - 3.5 out of 5                      152K Ratings
 - Great but…         Jul 1   grsrbr    This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.       Great but…          Jul 1   grsrbr  This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

 - Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.         Sep 19   hotace6813    I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless  “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you  to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.       Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.          Sep 19   hotace6813  I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless  “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you  to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

 - Needs an update         Nov 1   Nynini91    I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.       Needs an update          Nov 1   Nynini91  I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

 - Apple Store is the best i love Apple the way and i will always love Apple         Jan 26   Game Er lover    Best place to shop at in person and online I’m happy i got my iPhone 16 Plus delivered from them last year in November the delivery and shipment is very fast and great i love you apple fan workers a lot you guys are the best i also like the MagSafe wireless charger you guys it’s fast amazing it’s also one of my favorite Apple accessories you guys sell I’m also glad you guys sell New iPhones and Refurbished iPhones but personally me i buy brand new iPhones only because they last more longer and i always like to buy brand new stuff i hope i get to buy more Apple phones or Apple accessories from you guys be safe Apple workers and thank you for the help       Apple Store is the best i love Apple the way and i will always love Apple          Jan 26   Game Er lover  Best place to shop at in person and online I’m happy i got my iPhone 16 Plus delivered from them last year in November the delivery and shipment is very fast and great i love you apple fan workers a lot you guys are the best i also like the MagSafe wireless charger you guys it’s fast amazing it’s also one of my favorite Apple accessories you guys sell I’m also glad you guys sell New iPhones and Refurbished iPhones but personally me i buy brand new iPhones only because they last more longer and i always like to buy brand new stuff i hope i get to buy more Apple phones or Apple accessories from you guys be safe Apple workers and thank you for the help

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Great but…
grsrbr
This is a very helpful app, I love that all my devices are already loaded in there and that all other compatible products default to each when browsing, saving me time and headache. I love the option to save lists, but unfortunately it doesn’t work. Several times now I have made separate saved items lists only to find they’re completely gone when I return. How is it possible that the company that pioneered the use of the cloud doesn’t use the cloud to remember their customer’s saved items in their own app? Baffling. Other than that I love to see which third party products are featured in the app before I make my final decisions as in my opinion, having something that is endorsed by Apple gives me a little bit more peace of mind when making expensive tech purchases. The tab where you can explore what’s happening at the Apple stores near me, etc. is also a fantastic one, so I can learn more in depth info about my products.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Useless app and developers. Fixed reviews by staff and developers.
hotace6813
I had auto download and update off, the new update forced mine and my wife’s phone to update after 3 days me telling it no. I smell a class action lawsuit. Forcing us to lock in with a cell phone carrier for 2-3 years per phone. We have a family business and have multiple phones, we are all having issues. I googled the same issues are wide spread. Every “new” update makes it worst. ThisLatest changes my settings and icons. It freezes all day long. I can’t uninstall the update. Even a set up new phone don’t help because it forces the latest “flawed” and zero day vulnerabilities in these apps. I’ve been a victim of identity theft 3 times already since I got these phones. Don’t tell me iPhones can’t get hacked. Give us the owners of the phone the option to not install or uninstall your useless “security” fixes. Every time you force us to update all that screws up our phone, which then forces us to buy a new phone just to turn around for you to screw it up. It’s a never ending scam. You’re useless. These phones ain’t worth the paperweight used for. You should be ashamed of yourself Apple should be shut down permanently. Goodbye.

# Needs an update
Nynini91
I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

I love Apple and everything, but there needs to be a slight update when buying something. I bought my bsf a iMac computer, and she used my card. But not thinking, to even put all my info in far as billing address. She ended up putting hers and Apple took my money, but then said they didn’t because it was pending. And I’m like how because it say it took it. But anyways when someone is doing something like that on the website, it needs to be an immediate email saying wrong billing address. So we don’t be no problems. Like I understand theft is out there and people scam A LOT, but it needs to be some type of alert that says “Not matching billing address”…even though the error was on our side because we wasn’t thinking in that moment because it’s common sense. But maybe that can be changed in the future.

# Apple Store is the best i love Apple the way and i will always love Apple

Best place to shop at in person and online I’m happy i got my iPhone 16 Plus delivered from them last year in November the delivery and shipment is very fast and great i love you apple fan workers a lot you guys are the best i also like the MagSafe wireless charger you guys it’s fast amazing it’s also one of my favorite Apple accessories you guys sell I’m also glad you guys sell New iPhones and Refurbished iPhones but personally me i buy brand new iPhones only because they last more longer and i always like to buy brand new stuff i hope i get to buy more Apple phones or Apple accessories from you guys be safe Apple workers and thank you for the help

# What’s New

# Version History
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 6.6 Nov 13
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 6.5.1 Jul 17

 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 6.1 08/08/2024
 - A fresh, more curated experience that makes it easier to quickly find the most relevant content on the For You tab, shop the latest on the Products tab, and make the most of the devices you already own on the Go Further tab.

Check out the new video series from Today at Apple with featured guests that will inspire you to do more with your devices. 

New options to customize your privacy settings and preferences give you enhanced control over how Apple will use the data you share with us. 6.0 07/16/2024
 - - Get support during the purchase process with videos, including transcripts for those who need them. 5.24 05/03/2024
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.23 02/22/2024
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.22 01/11/2024
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.21 08/08/2023
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.20 05/30/2023
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.19.1 03/30/2023
 - - Easily share lists of saved items with your friends and family.
- Access and continue shopping your saved items in more places throughout the app.
- View more details about our Apple Store locations and its surroundings.

Note that the Apple Store app and certain features are available only in select countries. 5.19 02/20/2023
 - New capability to engrave Memoji on AirPods and AirPods Pro, exclusively in the app. 5.18 11/14/2022
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.17.1 10/27/2022
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.17 08/08/2022
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.16 05/25/2022
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.15 02/24/2022
 - - Save items you like as lists. Share a list with a Specialist in store, and get a recap of the conversation sent to the app to easily buy what you like when ready.
- Enjoy videos with Audio Descriptions to hear all the product details. 5.14 11/11/2021
 - - Various improvements and performance enhancements. 5.13 07/29/2021

# Accessibility

# Accessibility
The developer, Apple, indicated that this app supports the following accessibility features to help make common tasks in the app faster and easier to complete. Learn More
 - VoiceOver Navigate and explore the app using gestures, braille, and speech output.
 - Voice Control Navigate and interact with the app using your voice to tap, swipe, type, and more.
 - Larger Text Increase the text size in the app to 200% or more.
 - Differentiate Without Color Alone Use shapes or text, in addition to or instead of color, to distinguish key information.
 - Sufficient Contrast Increase or adjust the contrast between text or iconography and background.
 - Reduced Motion Modify or reduce certain types of animation that may cause motion sickness or discomfort.
 - Captions Display the dialogue and relevant sounds of video or audio-only content with text, usually time-synchronized.
